title: minecraft:cooldown
description: After you use an item, all items specified with the same `cool down category` setting becomes unusable for the duration specified by the 'cool down time' setting in this component.

category.description: The type of cool down for this item. All items with a cool down component with the same category are put on cool down when one is used.

duration.description: The duration of time (in seconds) items with a matching category will spend cooling down before becoming usable again.
